a.title: Click Here for Wi-Fi Hotspots & Technology Help Information
a.aria-label: Click Here for Wi-Fi Hotspots & Technology Help Information

div.span: Click Here for Wi-Fi Hotspots & Technology Help Information

a.div: Please call the Grayson County Schools IT Department if you have any issues related to accessing instructional materials while at home during the school closure. We can be reached by phone (276)773-2832 or at techhelp@gcpsva.org.

div.div:
Welcome
Grayson County Public Schools’ mission is to provide a quality education through shared responsibility in a safe supportive environment for all students to meet the challenges of a global society. We are “Working Together to Increase Student Achievement”, and we work hard to make the site a primary source for timely information for all users, and a main gateway for improved communication between parents, teachers, students and other members of our community.

span.data-emptytext: Grayson County Public Schools provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment
span.data-value:
Mailing address: P.O. Box 888, Independence, VA 24348 - Grayson County Public Schools provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment.
Grayson County Public Schools (GCPS) does not use cookies nor does it collect information through its website.
Through the GCPS website you may link to other websites which are not under the control of GCPS. The inclusion of any link does not necessarily imply an endorsement of the views expressed within the external site.

p.span:
Mailing address: P.O. Box 888, Independence, VA 24348 - Grayson County Public Schools provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment.
Grayson County Public Schools (GCPS) does not use cookies nor does it collect information through its website.
Through the GCPS website you may link to other websites which are not under the control of GCPS. The inclusion of any link does not necessarily imply an endorsement of the views expressed within the external site.

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click ‘read more’ to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. You’ll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
